EmailTemplate.name: dbu_IntegrationLog_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: dbu Integration failed/exception error log email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,</br> We are getting exception or Integration failed. Please check the below details.</br></br> Description: {!Description}</br> Request: {!Request}</br> Response: {!Response}</br> Service Name: {!Service_Name}</br> Status: {!Status}</br> Code: {!Code}</br></br>
Thanks & Regards,</br> Ecomm
